meanings.definition: Covered with woolly or downy hairs.
meanings.sent1: The lanate sheep looked fluffy and warm.
meanings.sent2: The lanate blanket felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The lanate teddy bear seemed to have its own cozy sweater.
meanings.sent4: The lanate clouds in the sky resembled cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The lanate coat of the puppy was a delight to touch.

meanings.definition: Having a woolly or downy texture.
meanings.sent1: Her lanate scarf kept her neck warm in the cold.
meanings.sent2: The lanate peach was fuzzy to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The lanate pillow felt like a cloud when she rested her head on it.
meanings.sent4: The lanate caterpillar moved slowly along the branch.
meanings.sent5: The lanate sweater was her favorite to wear on chilly days.
